description: Delicious and easy twist on a family classic.
name: Whole Roast Butter Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Top the entire dish (chicken and vegetables) with a drizzle of the sour cream sauce, some more coriander leaves and the dried cranberries. Carve and serve at the table
